name: Michelle Vaughn
text: I had the most pleasant experience ordering pizza here. Jasmine was so sweet and helpful.. She brought a smile to my face with her great attitude and excellent customer service.. If you go to blade pizza then Jasmine is the one you want making your pizza.. TOP NOTCH!!

name: Michael Bottorf
text: Excellent pizza! I got the build-your-own pizzas. I started with the original dough crust, which was crisp, thin and chewy. Then you are able to select as many ingredients as you would like. I chose pepperoni, Italian sausage, bacon, red ‚Ä¶More

name: Ron Pahoulis
text: Great place and pizza. Everything is always great. Recommend it highly.

name: J Nguyen
text: Pretty big individual size pizza. Very generous w toppings. I love the spicy red sauce! We requested both of our pizzas to be extra crispy and they definitely did that. The place is pretty empty and slow. Tables were clean. You have to request straws though. Definitely prefer blaze pizza vs pieology.

name: David Ezra Vinson
text: Absolutely delicious! I recommend the build your own pizza with pesto. We had a two-for-one deal so it came out as $5.20 each.

name: Abel Estrada
text: Great atmosphere...great people and great pizza. They offer specific types of pizzas but I like to build my own pizza. I recommend the spreads for the pizza edge. The pizzas are always baked well.

name: Guy Meza
text: Incredible variety of fresh toppings including four kinds of cheeses and three kinds of sauces.  A build-your-own pizza is less than $9 and you can select any amount of toppings you want.

name: eli92844
text: My first time at Blaze Pizza. I decided to give it a try because of all the ‚Äúgood reviews‚Äù I ordered 4 pizzas I paid more than 45$ and all four were burned like really burned. My family and I couldn‚Äôt even eat them. They tasted horrible. ‚Ä¶More

name: jannine gonzalez
text: Worst customer service!! I came in on April 19th around 2pm there was a young man & girl.. The you man was so rude! Definitely not coming back to this location!!

name: Leiana Brito
text: Best keto crust I've tried! Outside of that not sure I'd go here. Price is decent and food is good but we have similar options closer.

name: Robert Palma
text: Best pizza ever!! Ordered online, all the veggies and pesto drizzle, and the agua fresva are the best Ive ever had!! Love this place!!

name: Sasha R
text: The customer service is nonexistent. The employees spent more time flirting with one another than helping out the actual customer. When I finally got their attention, the young women and man was rude and condescending. I will never come back to this location.

name: Karina Ruvalcaba
text: My kids and I love Blaze Pizza. Very affordable, great taste and fast service. I found it a bit confusing the first time on how to order, but once you get it, you're going to love it.

name: Matthew
text: Really tasty pizza. Couldn't give five stars cause they burnt the bottom of one of my pizzas last time. Still not bad tasting though.

name: David Carrasco
text: Good but nothing to write home about,I think I'll try the spicy red sauce next time

name: Demonic Id
text: Really enjoyed my spicy pizza. I'll definitely have to come back

name: luis aguayo
text: pizza so good, you'll slap little Caesars in the face lol üòÇ

name: David Kirby
text: Usually the pizza is excellent, but tonight the crusts were burned on two of our three. And the third one was overdone.

name: Valeria Barricks
text: Excellent pizza!

name: MARY ANN TAMURA
text: Build your own pizza.  Lots of choices

name: Richard Uelman
text: Amazing pizza tailored your way!

name: M M.
text: One of the best pizzas out there

name: Suzanne Joines
text: Very good for the price. First time going.

text: Excellent food and service.

name: Mario Munoz

name: connie griffin
